#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

inline long long  inp()
{
    register long long  r=0,c;   
    for(c=getchar_unlocked(); c<=32; c=getchar_unlocked());
    if(c=='-')
        return -inp();
    for(; c>32; r=(r<<1)+(r<<3)+c-'0',c=getchar_unlocked());
    return r;
}

int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	t=inp();
	while(t--)
	{
		ll s,e,n;
		s=inp();
		e=inp();
		n=inp();
		int flag=0;
		while(n--)
		{
			ll a,b;
			a=inp();
			b=inp();
			//cin>>a>>b;
			if((a>s&&a<e) || (b>s&&b<e) || (a<=s&&b>=e))
				flag=1;
		}
		if(flag==0)
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
